LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.label: 手斧
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.description: A practical wood cutting handaxe. Trees beware! Equipping this boosts plant work speed by 30%.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.label: 鹤嘴锄
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.description: A practical mining pickaxe. We have to go deeper. Equipping this boosts mining work speed by 30%.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.label: 锤子
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.description: A practical construction hammer. Be careful with your fingers! Equipping this boosts construction work speed by 30%.
